Headline: Brown Line Delays
ShortDescription: Brown Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier unauthorized person on the tracks near Irving Park. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Brown Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier unauthorized person on the tracks near Irving Park.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #56 Milwaukee Temporary Southbound Reroute near Milwaukee/Division
ShortDescription: SB 56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted via Milwaukee, Division, Elston, and Milwaukee due to, street blockage near Milwaukee/Division.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted via Milwaukee, Division, Elston, and Milwaukee due to, street blockage near Milwaukee/Division.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
